title: Your Shop
body:
It'd be nice if it didn't always pick skins for champions I already own all the skins I like for. 

I play these champions. I bought their skins. That doesn't mean I want their bad ones. 

That, and they're less likely to get my money if it only gives me sales like this. Heck, there are some champions I don't play just because the base skin makes me sad. 

They've also specifically stated that you can get skins for champions you don't own and will get them as a bundle. Perhaps this means it won't rely so heavily on who you play.

replies.body: And how do you plan on having the system determine your taste in skin styles?

Randomize it.
Or specifically prevent it from being for champions you already own 2+ skins on. Last thing I need is Nottingham Ezreal when I own Pulsefire and Arcade.

First thing I want is slayer Jinx when I also own SG Jinx and Firecracker Jinx : / Hope it doesn't work this way.
Well I got Debonair Ezreal in my sale. Happy now? lol

My issue is specifically with getting crappy options when I own all the good ones. 

Like Mafia Jinx, in your case.
Maybe based on series.  Like oh wow you own all the prject skins execpt leona so heres the project leona skin

I actually got Project Leona in my last shop. 
And as the free shard from crafting the three icons.

I do not want it.
It was an example as i dont know which skins you own another example for me is i own all jayce skins except debonair because i dont like the debonair line so im hoping its not in my your shop

How is Riot supposed to know which skins you do and don't like?

If they make it truly random, you could get skins for champions you don't own, like, or you do like and play but you have all the skins you like for. 

If they make it for champions you don't own any skins for, then you'l likely get skins for champions who you don't play but do own.

>If they make it truly random, you could get skins for champions you don't own

They've made it so you can, and you'll get the champion as a bundle if you do. 

And no, I can't. I own everyone. 

And that's fine. I'm more prone to buy good looking skins for champions I don't play because they're ugly -Camille- than I am to buy ugly skins for champions I do play when I already own their good skins.
